summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.3 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (down 0.3 mm), cloud levels (up 1642 m), feels like temperature (up 2.2°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels and little or no wind. Chance of light rain, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dark. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
